Name: Toilet Seat Riser with Arms
Specifications:
Large molded arms for security and support
  • Raises toilet seat height by 3½"
  • Mounting bolts and easy to follow instructions included
  • Standard and elongated style available

Arm height: 7¼" from rim of bowl
  • Width between arms: 19"
  • Weight: less than 4 lbs.
  • Weight capacity 300 lbs.
